title: Katarina'a AA animation speed... Thank you Rito!
body:
Just played a game with Katarina, and I LOVE THE AA CHANGE!!! It feels so much less clunkier and I didn't feel cheated out of CS.
{{champion:55}}  Violence solves EVERYTHING!

replies.body:
Honestly, i always %%%% up every time an AA animation change happens, i managed to miss like 20 CS in my first nid game after the AA speed up because i'd hit the minion just before it was killable and a minion would kill it.

But the AA animation increase on Kat means something else, which is easier ability to go Q>E>W and not have to wait for your Q to land to do the E>W part as you can rely on your AA being there.

First game I played with new Katarina I found my CS had increased. Second game with her I was in a mirror lane, and every time I'd QEW the other Kat, she'd at least E-AA so I didn't get away with free poke. It was effective...
I think we can use a new combo now for Kat: Q - E - AA - W - AA. Because the animation is faster, you'd get away with an AA right after Shunpo without spending more time than you would pre-update.
No debate that it can be a good thing (especially on Kat) I just in general don't always like these sorts of changes, cause even a split second change can %%%% CS.
